newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Drifting lake ice strands up to 100 Russians - Tass.
newsitem.headline: Drifting lake ice strands up to 100 Russians - Tass.

text.p: Up to 100 fishermen were stranded in bad weather on Saturday on ice floes which drifted away from the shores of Ladoga Lake in northwestern Russia, Itar-Tass news agency said.

Tass said rescue teams in light boats had managed to pick up only eight fishermen from floes which drifted close to shore. Most of the massive chunks of ice had floated up five km (three miles) from shore and were only accessible by helicopter.
Tass said a severe storm and poor visibility in the area had slowed the rescue operation.
